      • openFile

        public static void openFile(android.content.Context c,
                            android.net.Uri uri,
                            java.lang.String mimetype)
        Convenience method to open a file. You need to provide a uri and a mimetype.
        Parameters:
        c - The Android context.
        uri - The uri to the file.
        mimetype - The mimetype of the file.

      • getContentUriForFile

        public static android.net.Uri getContentUriForFile(android.content.Context c,
                                                   vstore.framework.file.VStoreFile f)
        This method returns the content provider uri for this file. You can use this uri to open the file with other applications.
        Parameters:
        c - The Android context.
        Returns:
        The content uri

      • getPathFromContentUri

        public static java.lang.String getPathFromContentUri(android.content.Context c,
                                                     android.net.Uri contentUri,
                                                     java.lang.String tmpName)
        Copies the file into a temporary folder and returns the path to this folder.
        Parameters:
        c - The Android context
        contentUri - The uri of the file in the content provider
        tmpName - The name for the temporary file.
        Returns:
        The absolute path to the file.

      • getNameFromContentProvider

        public static java.lang.String getNameFromContentProvider(android.content.Context c,
                                                          android.net.Uri uri,
                                                          java.lang.String defaultVal)
        Reads the name of a file from the content provider.
        Parameters:
        c - The android context.
        uri - The uri of the file in the content provider.
        defaultVal - The default value to return if no name is found.
        Returns:
        The name of the file, or the default value.

      • copyFileFromContentUri

        public static java.io.File copyFileFromContentUri(android.content.Context c,
                                                  android.net.Uri uri,
                                                  java.lang.String inputFileName,
                                                  java.io.File outputPath,
                                                  java.lang.String outputName)
        Copies a file into the given output folder coming from a "content://" uri.
        Parameters:
        c - The Android context.
        uri - The content scheme uri.
        inputFileName - The file name of the input file.
        outputPath - The path where to save the file.
        outputName - The name of the output file that should be created.
        Returns:
        A file object containing a reference to the created output file. Will return null if Uri is no "content://" uri.

      • copyFileFromInputStream

        private static java.io.File copyFileFromInputStream(java.io.FileInputStream in,
                                                    java.lang.String inputFileName,
                                                    java.io.File outputPath,
                                                    java.lang.String outputName)
        Copies a file fro the input stream to the given output path with the given output name. The given file input stream will not be closed.
        Parameters:
        in - The file input stream to copy data from.
        inputFileName - The filename of the input file.
        outputPath - The output path where to save the new file.
        outputName - The name of the new file.
        Returns:
        A File object containing a reference to the path of the created file.

      • writeStringToFile

        public static java.io.File writeStringToFile(java.lang.String s,
                                             java.io.File outputPath,
                                             java.lang.String outputName)
        Writes the given String to the given file in the given output path. Creates necessary directories on the way to output path if they do not exist.
        Parameters:
        s - The string to write to the file.
        outputPath - The path where the output file should be created.
        outputName - The name of the output file.
        Returns:
        The file object referencing the created file.

      • hasExtension

        public static boolean hasExtension(java.lang.String filename)
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename to check
        Returns:
        True, if the file has an extension
